sentence.Network_en: She took revenge on her ex-boyfriend by smashing up his home.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了报复，她砸了前任男友的家。

sentence.Network_en: They should make up with their ex-enemy in the West.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们应该和西方的老对头和解。

sentence.Network_en: The plaintiff's sole witness, a gambler and layabout, was easily discredited.
sentence.Network_cn: 原告唯一的证人嗜赌成性，游手好闲，其证词一下子就被推翻了。

auth_sentence.content: These are incredibly ex citing times for space exploration.
auth_sentence.res_content: These are incredibly ex citing times for space exploration.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These are incredibly ex citing times for space exploration.

auth_sentence.content: I had nothing to fear from an ex-dead man.
auth_sentence.res_content: I had nothing to fear from an ex-dead man.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I had nothing to fear from an ex-dead man.

auth_sentence.content: The maintenance of his ex-wife and her mongol son.
